duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement human resources policies, programs, and practices to enhance the organization's human resources.
Lead and manage human resources operations, including talent acquisition, staffing, compensation, training, employee relations, compliance, and labor relations.
Provide human resources advice and counsel to support management in decision-making and employee actions.
Guide management and employee actions by developing and updating policies, procedures, and guidelines in line with organizational values.
Ensure compliance with legal requirements, anticipate legislation changes, and advise management on necessary actions.
Participate in conferences, educational opportunities, and maintain professional networks to update job knowledge and enhance department and organization reputation.
Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results and exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or relevant experience (Master's preferred)
